## Install

Uses `fp-ts` as a peer dependency.

```bash
yarn add fp-ts @fp-ts-libs&#x2F;strings
```

or

```bash
npm install fp-ts @fp-ts-libs&#x2F;strings
```

## Example

```ts
import * as Lib from '@fp-ts-libs&#x2F;strings'

// write an example...
```
